holidays.title: Birth Anniversary of His Majesty the King
holidays.description: We get three days to honor the King of Bhutan. So join in the festivities.

holidays.title: Card Reading Day
holidays.description: The memories and sentiment linger on even with the yellowing of the paper.

holidays.title: Father Lini Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about one of the notable figures in the history of Vanuatu.

holidays.title: International Mother Language Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the beauty and importance of different languages and cultures on this day.

holidays.title: King Harald V's Day
holidays.description: From his turbulent childhood to his refreshingly modern outlook, here’s the story of King Harald V.

holidays.title: Language Day
holidays.description: Let us all work together to save many of the world's endangered languages and historical heritage.

holidays.title: Language Movement Day
holidays.description: Let us explore how language became the identity of a nation and how it won freedom.

holidays.title: National Grain Free Day
holidays.description: Food for thought? Read on and find out more about the importance of National Grain-Free Day.

holidays.title: Robert Gabriel Mugabe National Youth Day
holidays.description: How much do you know about Robert Gabriel Mugabe? Learn more about him here.

holidays.title: Alan Rickman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the actor who played Severus Snape in the “Harry Potter” film series!

holidays.title: Blanket Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this budding media personality and young artist, success is just around the corner!

holidays.title: Giveon’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a talented singer and songwriter who topped the charts and won hearts.

holidays.title: John Lewis’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn things you probably didn't know about American politician John Lewis right here!

holidays.title: Jordan Peele’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented Hollywood personality is cementing his success one shot at a time.

holidays.title: Nina Simone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this multi-talented blues-folk singer’s rich, versatile story right here!

holidays.title: Solar’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer is creating a legacy that will stand time’s test.

holidays.title: Sophie Turner’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptional actress, nothing is stopping her from reaching even greater fame.

holidays.title: Wendy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Wendy is joining many others in making a name for herself in the K-pop scene.
